name: Sunny Forest
description: A bright and colorful forest filled with tall trees and singing birds.

name: Misty Mountains
description: Snowy peaks where clouds drift slowly across the valleys.

name: Nutty Park
description: A fun place full of acorn trees and playful critters.

name: Icy Bay
description: A frozen shoreline where penguins gather to fish.

name: Meadow Hollow
description: A peaceful field of flowers buzzing with bees.

name: Banana Jungle
description: A tropical jungle full of vines and fruit trees.

name: Stripe Savannah
description: A grassy plain where big cats roam and zebras graze.

name: Whisker Town
description: A cozy little town with tiny houses and alleyways.

name: Moonlight Woods
description: A dark forest that glows under the moonlight.

name: Pawville
description: A friendly neighborhood where dogs of all breeds live.
